title: Champion-Select fail!
body:
Dear Riot,
I wanted to start a game but when i klicked accept i should be in the champion-select but i had a black screen! I couldnt write anything in the chat and clouldnt select a champion! After this it just failed and when I wanted to start another game i had to wait i "recently abandoned a game". Really?!
My brother once had the same problem! Am I the only one with this problem?

Lerkul

replies.body: Pls go back to NA Forum
Maybe repair you League of Legeneds
